Welcome to Auntie Boo Crafts!

I'm passionate about creating handcrafted and personalized items. I specialize in tumblers, mugs, glitter pens, key chains, badge reels, phone grips and bag charms. I have something for every price point. Almost all items can be customized. I love working with customers to create something unique and personal.
